thread.title: Moderate Mag. 4.3 Earthquake - Caspian Sea, 82 km West of Tuerkmenbasy, Balkan, Turkmenistan, on Thursday, Dec 11, 2025, at 05:31 am (GMT +5)
thread.title_full: Moderate Mag. 4.3 Earthquake - Caspian Sea, 82 km West of Tuerkmenbasy, Balkan, Turkmenistan, on Thursday, Dec 11, 2025, at 05:31 am (GMT +5)

author: @EQAlerts
title: Moderate Mag. 4.3 Earthquake - Caspian Sea, 82 km West of Tuerkmenbasy, Balkan, Turkmenistan, on Thursday, Dec 11, 2025, at 05:31 am (GMT +5)
text:
A moderate magnitude 4.3 earthquake occurred in the Caspian Sea near the coast of Turkmenistan in the early morning of Thursday, Dec 11, 2025 at 5.31 am local time (GMT +5). The quake had a shallow depth of 37 km (23 mi) and was not felt (or at least not reported so).
| Date & time | Dec 11, 2025 00:31:54 UTC - |

| Magnitude | 4.3 |
| Depth | 37 km |
